name: Pale Grey-Blue Birdhouse
description:
If your finches, wrens and chickadees are looking for a cool place to call home...this is it! Soft grey blue glaze tops off this charming birdhouse hand-made and wheel-thrown from grey stoneware. Removable lid for easy cleaning....or peeking, this durable, water resistant birdhouse can stand up to anything Mother Nature dumps on it!
Dimensions are 7 1/2" tall and the lid is 7 1/4" wide. 

Comes with cherry branch perch, wood hanging pegs and black twine hanger. All you need to do is hang it in your favorite spot and watch the birds move in!

name: Large Stoneware Bird Feeder Pistachio Shino Glaze
description:
A wonderful addition to your yard, garden or patio, this feeder has a beautiful pale pistachio green and rust glaze, which lends a perfect rustic charm to your yard, and is treat for both you and your feathered friends! Wheel-thrown buff stoneware along with the driftwood perches, make it sturdy enough for larger birds like jays, cardinals etc.
This feeder hold approximately 40 oz of seed. Filling is a breeze, just raise the lid which slides up on the twine and stays attached.
Dimensions:
Total height is 14" from tip to tip
Lid is 8" across
The seed "jar" is 8" x 4" 
Perches and seed trays stick out from base about 6" making it approx 12" wide while hanging.

Comes with driftwood perches collected on the beach at Deception Pass, WA. Pre attached 75# test, wheat colored nylon hanging twine and driftwood hanging pegs. Perches are shipped unattached, and come with the copper wire for you to attach.

name: Maple Leaf Moss Green Crackle Raku Birdhouse
description:
Another beautiful birdhouse from my "Leaf Impression" series. Wheel thrown, altered, impressed with real maple leaves from the trees in my yard, with hand created clay "branches" for the perch. More leaves form an awning to keep your bird friends warm and dry!
Beautiful moss green color on the leaves with rich deep black smoked areas, this birdhouse is perfect for smaller and medium birds like finches, bluebirds, sparrows, wrens and chickadees!

This is a back hanging, jar-style birdhouse. It can be hung on a fence, tree or under the eaves of your house, garage or barn. The back has a keyhole knotch to slide securely over a nail or screw.

Dimensions: 5" tall by 7 1/4" deep. Inside room is approx 5" x 5".

name: Tiny Wren White Crackle Raku Birdhouse
description:
This is a beautiful piece of art for your garden and a wonderful home for Wrens, Chicadees and Finches! Raku fired with white crackle glaze with deep black-smoked detailed areas. This is a must for all wren lovers with a hand sculpted tiny wren sitting in a nest right on top! Wheel thrown raku clay with hand sculpted accents, with a perch made from driftwood collected along the beach at Deception Pass, WA. 
This birdhouse is 7" tall (including wren on top)and 5" wide with a 2" long perch. Comes with driftwood perch, driftwood hanging pegs and black hanging twine.

name: Red Wren Raku Birdhouse
description:
This is a beautiful piece of art for your garden and a wonderful home for Wrens, Chicadees and Finches! Raku fired with white crackle glaze with deep black-smoked detailed areas. This is a must for all wren lovers with a hand sculpted wren sitting in a nest right on top! Comes with a perch made from driftwood collected along the beach at Deception Pass. 
This birdhouse is 7" tall (including wren on top)and 4 1/2" wide. Comes with driftwood perch and black hanging twine.
